GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.37 to before v4.9.293
GSD.description:
can: pch_can: pch_can_rx_normal: fix use after free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.293 by commit 3a3c46e2eff0577454860a203be1a8295f4acb76, it was introduced in version v2.6.37 by commit b21d18b51b31a24d17f883b678432fbdee3d5675. For more details please see the references link.
